ss:Cell.ss:Data:
source /opt/mobivi/bin/reportfunc.sh #useDbases airtime reportId=report.airtime.provider.txn.info CURRENT_REPORT_ID=$REPORT_ID export REPORT_ID=$reportId
if [ -z "$REPORT_NAME" ]; then export REPORT_NAME=GiaoDichHeThong_Rpt.$cretime.xls fi
/opt/airtime-report-0.1.0/bin/airtime_report.sh export REPORT_ID=$CURRENT_REPORT_ID reportname=$REPORT_NAME storeReport
Báo cáo chi tiết giao dịch nạp airtime
